summary:
Adds a fully decked out player home in a scenic location.
Lots of customised storage space inside and out.
descriptionHtml:
Thorvaldson Blacksmiths is something I have been working on for myself and have decided to share.
I wanted plenty of storage space but nothing too spread out.
I have hopefully created a nice, cozy and fully functional home.

The first floor has a lounge/dining area. 2 bedrooms.
The basement has a small forge area, an alchemy/enchanting area and a food and drink area.

Outside you have the full forge with all the necessary equipment, including flowers, fruits and vegetables.

I have kept it lore friendly whilst also indulging in custom items created by:
Oaristys - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2235573/?tb=about&pUp=1
and Blary - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2250922/?tb=about&pUp=1
author: Skarz88
